Key Arguments: The legislation is only applied to the general public and independent media.
The bill grants undefined powers, making it 'open-ended'.
The government is not capable of deciding what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
The legislation represents a 'big brother' style of government, which the author opposes.
The government should be investigated for misinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Notable Quotes: This proposed amendment reeks of a ‘big brother’ style of government – one I am totally opposed to as the government should be getting out of our lives not trying to control them.
There is a massive amount of evidence that the government stated was false has now turned out to be completely true and shown the government to be inept.
